item.title: ‘Stick to the policy’: Telangana HC questions concessions in Banjara Hills land regularisation for GHMC mayor, brother
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Telangana High Court on Wednesday directed the state government to re-examine an order of May 2023 that regularised illegally encroached land parcels in Banjara Hills in the favour of Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation (GHMC) Mayor Vijayalaxmi Gadwal and her brother K Venkateshwara Rao, and “rectify the impugned order, if deemed necessary.”
The Division Bench of Chief Justice Aparesh Kumar Singh and Justice G M Mohiuddin was hearing a Public Interest Litigation (PIL) petition filed by ...]]>
item.author: Rahul V Pisharody, Rahul V Pisharody Is Assistant Editor With The Indian Express Online, Has Been Reporting For Ie On Various News Developments Telangana Since He Is Currently Reporting On Legal Matters The Telangana High Court., Rahul Started His Career As A Journalist In With The New Indian Express, Worked In Different Roles At The Hyderabad Bureau For Over Years. As Deputy Metro Editor, He Was In Charge Of The Hyderabad Bureau Of The Newspaper, Coordinated With The Team Of City Reporters, District Correspondents, Other Centres, Internet Desk For Over Three Years.
